nodes.text: Bob Bergen (born March 8, 1964) is an American voice actor best known for his work on Looney Tunes cartoons. He has provided voicing for a number of LucasArts Star Wars video games and computer games, and was often used as the voice for Luke Skywalker. He is the official "audio double" for Mark Hamill.
